string.value: Acquiring the Seed for the Snowfield Rose
The #t4031696# that #p2111003# requested can only be obtained through #b#p2020005##k at #b#m211000000##k. I better go talk to #p2020005#.

#p2020005# said #t4031696# is something only the alchemists are aware of, and seemed surprised that I knew it. He then promised to give me #t4031696# as long as I defeat #r100 Leattys#k for him. \n\n#o5300000# #r#a33361##k
I finally received #t4031696# from #p2020005#. Good, now I better get back to #p2111003#.
What do you want from an old guy like me? If it's about magic or alchemy, I can help you, but...what? A Snowfield Rose seed? Yes, I have a few, but how in the world did you know about that?

The Snowfield Rose is a flower borne out of alchemy. Some may say its an abomination of nature, but I look at it as enhancement of nature's flawed qualities. Most people don't know that. I don't think you are an alchemist either, so I am baffled as to how you found out about it...
The seed of the Snowfield Rose is a special, rare item. I can't give it to you for free...however, if you do me a favor, then I will give you one. Deal?

Then I want you to defeat 100 Leattys. Everyone in town have been vocal about how they are destroying Orbis Tower, so if you help them out by defeating Leattys, then I'll give you the seed of the Snowfield Rose.
If you decline this offer, then I can't give you the seed of the Snowfield Rose either. I am sorry, but its much too valuable, even dangerous in the wrong hands.

I don't think you have defeated #r100 Leattys#k yet... please hurry. Leattys are causing much distress to the people here.
